titleStmt.title: The rest of the second replie of Thomas Cartvurihgt [sic]: agaynst Master Doctor Vuhitgifts second ansvuer, touching the Church discipline
titleStmt.author: Cartwright, Thomas, 1535-1603.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Whitgift, John. The defense of the Aunswere to the Admonition, against the Replie of T.C.
Printer's name and address from STC.
Variant: pasted-on list of additional errata on leaf )(4, of which there are at least two settings. Variant 1: line 3 of slip begins "tyme"; variant 2: line 3 begins "time".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
